main event: An observer watched a round-shaped object moving towards him for about two minutes, which made a high-pitched sound before disappearing in a dull glow.
interesting points: The object was observed for about two minutes,25 aircraft departed the base in two waves during the observation, A spark-like object was seen in the sky during the intervals, The report mentions a similar sighting in Kennett, Missouri, There were unconfirmed reports of up to 7 similar objects in the area over the last several nights.
